name: scotty goes to centrelink
description:
NOTE: This game may take a few minutes to load for the first time.
Don't panic if you see a black screen!


A surreal horror adventure starring Australia's 30th Prime Minister.

Help a newly unemployed Scott Morrison navigate the hellish welfare system that he helped build.

This game was released on the 2022 election day. Hopefully it will soon be proven true.

Otherwise it'll give us some catharsis before we start another torturous three years.

End credits song available here (lyric video hopefully coming soon)
